title: Priest

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
*At night guess someone's subalignment, if you are correct, bless them.
*You can only bless up to 3 people using this, but may continue to guess.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*Anyone blessed will be informed of being blessed.
*Blessed people do not need to die for the guild to win, as they will be picked up by the church.
*When a blessed person dies, you loose 1 profit as tax from the church, this does not happen when the item was used on them.

fields.name: Item:
fields.value:
Holy Water
Cost 2
Uses 1
Bless: Bless someone

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Goal: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)

desc:
Post 5059
*May our blessings be with you*
